question: where is the north pole on the world map
api_result: The North Pole is located at the northernmost point on Earth, at the geographic coordinates of 90 degrees North latitude. On a world map, it is found at the topmost point, typically depicted at the center of the Arctic region. The North Pole does not lie on any continent but is situated in the middle of the Arctic Ocean, amidst waters that are almost permanently covered with constantly shifting sea ice.
